TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeAttachEventStatement extends System.CodeDom.CodeStatement

Docs.summary: Represents a statement that attaches an event-handler delegate to an event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks CodeAttachEventStatement can be used to represent a statement that adds an event-handler delegate for an event. The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttachEventStatement.Event%2A> property indicates the event to attach the event handler to. The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeAttachEventStatement.Listener%2A> property indicates the event handler to attach.
## Examples The following example code demonstrates use of a CodeAttachEventStatement to attach an event handler with an event.
